alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 11:43AM MST until December 23 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM MST /6 PM PST/ THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST /7 AM PST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Lolo Pass, Dixie, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, Elk City, and Highway 12 Lowell to Lolo Pass. * WHEN...From 7 PM MST /6 PM PST/ this evening to 8 AM MST /7 AM PST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A cold front moves through causing a period of intense snow during the late evening hours. Patchy icy conditions are expected on roadways until sunrise.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
